net.cloud.client.nio.packet.packets

Class LoginPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.client.nio.packet.SendOnlyPacket
      • net.cloud.client.nio.packet.packets.LoginPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet

    public class LoginPacket
extends SendOnlyPacket
    Deals with the login process. Sends username/password to the server - which then responds with whether or not the credentials were valid.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LoginPacket.LoginDataRequestPacket
      A request we will send to the server once our login information has been verified.
      static class  LoginPacket.LoginDataResponsePacket
      We've gotten the login data we need! This is the last packet in the login process.
      static class  LoginPacket.LoginResponsePacket
      This packet is received by the client after we request to login.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private HashObj password
      Password of the player trying to login
      private java.lang.String username
      Username of the player trying to login

      • encode

        public void encode(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer)
            throws BufferableException
        Description copied from interface: Packet
        Packs the information contained in the Packet into a ByteBuf. The Packet at this point should already be initialized.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The ByteBuf that data will be placed into, from the current position
        Throws:
        BufferableException - If there is an issue encoding a Bufferable object
